description: A mixed use development, comprising 69 residential unites (Class C3), 107 room hotel (Class C1) (amended by 2011/1396), 472 sq.m. shops/office/restaurant (Classes A1, A2, A3), 39sq. m. taxi office, 42 sq.m. community / commercial space (Classes A1, A2, A3, D1), pedestrian access to Edison Close and associated parking, amenity space, access, landscaping and boundary treatments.
